services.subtitle: Comprehensive support for every stage of your business journey.
services.pageSubtitle: Tailor-made support for every financial, tax and administrative aspect of your business.
services.promiseText: At SRD Partners, we believe every entrepreneur deserves a fiduciary partner fully committed at their side — not just a service provider. Our teams combine technical expertise and availability to offer you personalized, responsive and confidential support.

items.title: Accounting & Tax
items.shortDesc: Bookkeeping, annual closing and tax optimization.
items.longDesc: We handle your entire accounting: document entry, bank reconciliations, annual financial statements, VAT returns and tax burden optimization. Our experts ensure full compliance with Swiss legal and tax requirements.

items.title: Management consulting
items.shortDesc: Financial steering, dashboards and business strategy.
items.longDesc: We support business leaders in strategic decisions: financial analysis, implementation of custom dashboards, budget planning, business valuation and growth advisory. Turn your financial data into real growth levers.

items.title: Audit & Review
items.shortDesc: Account review, limited review and restricted audit.
items.longDesc: Our audit services provide an independent and rigorous view of your financial statements. We perform limited reviews and restricted audits in accordance with Swiss auditing standards, ensuring transparency and credibility with your financial and institutional partners.

items.title: Wealth planning
items.shortDesc: Wealth structuring, succession and pension planning.
items.longDesc: Plan ahead with peace of mind. We advise you on structuring your private and professional assets, succession planning, optimizing your pension arrangements (2nd and 3rd pillar) and protecting your family and assets over the long term.

items.title: Company formation
items.shortDesc: End-to-end support from idea to registration.
items.longDesc: Bring your entrepreneurial project to life with our experts. Choosing the right legal form, drafting articles, registration with the Commercial Register, bank account opening and setting up administrative and accounting processes: we manage every step with you.

items.title: HR & Payroll
items.shortDesc: Payroll, social insurance and labor law support.
items.longDesc: Outsource your personnel administration to our HR specialists. Payroll processing, social insurance declarations (AHV/AVS, LPP, LAA), employment contracts, absence and leave tracking, and continuous regulatory monitoring: we free you from administrative constraints.

steps.title: First contact
steps.description: We take the time to understand your situation, goals and constraints. A no-commitment initial meeting lets you present your needs and discover our approach.

steps.title: Analysis & Strategy
steps.description: Our experts thoroughly analyse your financial, tax and administrative situation. Together we define the optimal strategy to achieve your objectives under the best conditions.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: We execute the action plan with rigour and within agreed deadlines. You receive regular updates and proactive communication at every key stage of the engagement.

steps.title: Ongoing support
steps.description: Our commitment does not end with the initial mandate. We remain your day-to-day partner, available to answer your questions and anticipate changes in your situation.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before entrusting us with your file.

items.question: How much does a tax return cost?
items.answer: Our fees depend on the complexity of your tax situation and the type of return involved (individual, company, estate). We systematically provide a transparent quote before any engagement. Feel free to contact us for a no-commitment preliminary meeting.

items.question: What documents do I need to provide?
items.answer: The list varies depending on your profile, but generally includes: salary certificates, bank and pension statements, insurance attestations, property deeds and all documents relating to your income and deductions. After an initial discussion, we will send you a precise, personalised list.

items.question: How long does processing take?
items.answer: For a standard tax return, allow an average of 2 to 4 weeks after receipt of all documents. More complex cases are subject to a timeline agreed with you in advance. We keep you informed at every key stage of the process.

items.question: Can I schedule an appointment?
items.answer: Absolutely. We offer in-office meetings in Geneva or Lausanne, as well as video consultations. The first meeting is free of charge and gives you the opportunity to explain your situation at ease. Contact us via our form or by phone to arrange a suitable time.

items.question: Is it confidential?
items.answer: Confidentiality is a fundamental principle of our profession. All information you share with us is protected by professional secrecy and handled with the utmost discretion. Your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

about.subtitle: Founded by passionate professionals from French-speaking Switzerland, SRD Partners is much more than a fiduciary firm: it is a long-term committed partner.
about.missionP1: At SRD Partners, our mission is simple: help you focus on your core business while we look after the financial, tax and administrative health of your company.
about.missionP2: Founded more than 15 years ago in Geneva, our firm supports SMEs, start-ups, independent professionals and families throughout French-speaking Switzerland. Our approach combines top-level technical expertise with a strong human relationship.
